mdfs.utils.io
Class SocketFunctions

java.lang.Object
  mdfs.utils.io.SocketFunctions

public class SocketFunctions
extends java.lang.Object

Handels writing and reading between sockets. SocketFunctions is mapped to a low level protocol for transfering text and binary files

Author:
Rasmus Holm
